title: Lone Survivor (2013) [BluRay video with DVDSCR audio]
description:
It seems like all of the BluRay versions of this movie have a problem with the audio such that voices are high-pitched. But I noticed that DVDSCR versions don't suffer this problem. So I decided to merge the video from a BluRay rip with the audio from a DVDSCR.

Video Source: https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/9830535/Lone_Survivor_(2013)_720p_BrRip_x264_-_YIFY

Audio Source (and subtitles): https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/9437141/Lone_Survivor_2013_DVDSCR_x264_AC3-JYK

I used mkvmerge to do most of the work. I believe I have the audio synced up properly, but some might prefer to adjust it +/- a few milliseconds.
